law.catch_line: Concurrent jurisdiction in investigation and prosecution of offenses under KRS 433.890 to 433.896, 433.900 to 433.906, and 512.090.
law.text: The Attorney General shall have concurrent jurisdiction with Commonwealth's attorneys and county attorneys in the investigation and prosecution of offenses under KRS 433.890 to 433.896, 433.900 to 433.906, and 512.090.
law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 91, sec. 6, effective July 12, 2012. -- Created 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 83, sec. 5, effective July 15, 2008.
